subject: ReactClassBased
question: Mention the X main diferences between Class Based Components state and state Hook.
answer:
state:
- There can be just one state.
- Individual properties of the state (object) can be edited, which will be merged into the state without affecting the other properties.
-
useState:
- There can be as many useStates as we want.
- It gets entirelly replaced, it could lose data.
